TopicTitle: What will be the first or best mod once 0.22 is out

Articles.Content:
First I say Kethane

Best I say Kethane or KAS
The one that will actually work without changes in code ?
someone in the media group already modded in a science part
I'm hoping it'll be something that adds the flavor text for doing Science to sandbox mode, rather than boring variations on "you can't do that" or "it means nothing." I still want to pretend, damnit.

Novapunch is updated, and the parts are added to the tech trees so you can unlock them as you play career. Its similar to stock progression, but things come faster since NP has so many more parts.

There are also some subassemblies to use in sandbox as well, and 2 new inline NERVA engines.

I'd say Interstellar Mod since it already had a science system BEFORE the 0.22 update and made great use of it. It might not be the first updated but it will likely the one to use it in the most original way.
For all I know, my achievements plugin was the first to officially support 0.22.

For all I know, my achievements plugin was the first to officially support 0.22.

Heh looks like we updated within 5 minutes of each other. Blasted slow upload speeds

Heh looks like we updated within 5 minutes of each other. Blasted slow upload speeds

If only the patcher had worked like it should...
The same as before - of course it's FAR.
I think the big winner is going to be Magic Egg!

I also want to give a shoutout to r4m0n - I think his TreeLoader and the un-released Editor are likely to be the biggest R&D tool, and I know it took a lot of work on his part to make it work as smooth as it does

I also want to give a shoutout to r4m0n - I think his TreeLoader and the un-released Editor are likely to be the biggest R&D tool, and I know it took a lot of work on his part to make it work as smooth as it does

I second this. Having a non-tutorial tech-tree for experienced players was vital, especially on upgrade day.
